name: Gangster && Mafia Pixel World
description:
Welcome in city created of pixel where you can be auto theft gangster! 3D open world city is perfect for third person shooting games. Grand robbery waits. It’s your thug life dude. Just be the real gangster in mafia crime city.

What you can do in this new crime simulator?

theft cars
jail break
grand city robbery
gang war
be the godfather

What you can use to win real grand city battle?

super cars
jetpack
military vehicles like tanks and helicopters
pixel gun
machine guns
other insane weapons


Third person view shooting action based on crazy gangsters missions!
Yeah, this is Pixel Gangster && Mafia games series.
